title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Visitor Center (corner of Jefferson and Hyde Streets/499 Jefferson)9:30am-5:00pm  415-447-5000 Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Days Aquatic Park Bathhouse Building (Maritime Museum) (Foot of Polk Street/900 Beach Street) Open daily from 10:00am-4:00pm (Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Days). The Aquatic Park Historic  District, which includes the Maritime Museum in the Bathhouse Building, underwent a multiyear rehabilitation. For more information please call the Visitor Center, 415-447-5000. Municipal Pier (Aquatic Park Pier) Closed dusk to dawn, year-round Hyde Street Pier (Foot of Hyde Street/2905 Hyde Street) 9:30am-5:00pm (last entry 4:30pm)  Ranger Office: 415-561-7169 Closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Days Maritime Research Center (library, archives, objects) (Building E, Third Floor, Fort Mason Center) The Research Center is open by appointment only, Monday through Friday, 1pm-4pm.  Appointments must be made at least 24 hours in advance.  Closed most federal holidays.  Please contact us to make an appointment with a reference librarian, for assistance with your research, or for more information.
